description: Welcome to this beautifully preserved and thoughtfully updated Victorian nestled in one of South Boston’s most sought-after neighborhoods. Boasting 3 spacious bedrooms and 2.5 modern bathrooms, this home perfectly blends timeless elegance with contemporary comforts. Step inside to discover soaring ceilings, original hardwood floors, and large new windows that flood the space with natural light. The main floor features a gracious living room open to a chef’s kitchen complete with granite countertops, newer stainless steel appliances, and custom cabinetry. A convenient half-bath is located on the main level. Follow the lovely staircase to the 2 bedrooms and large bathroom with tub/shower on the second floor. The third floor offers a serene retreat primary suite with ample closet space and a private en-suite bath featuring a walk-in shower and vanity. Walkout out the balcony on the third floor to enjoy city views. Includes private and fenced in side and back yard patio and lovely gardens!

attributeSource.infoString2: William Raveis Real Estate, Mortgage & Insurance

telephoneConsumerProtectionActDisclaimer.text: By pressing Contact agent, you agree that Zillow Group and its affiliates, and real estate professionals may call/text you about your inquiry, which may involve use of automated means and prerecorded/artificial voices. You don’t need to consent as a condition of buying any property, goods or services. Message/data rates may apply. You also agree to our Terms of Use. Zillow does not endorse any real estate professionals. We may share information about your recent and future site activity with your agent to help them understand what you’re looking for in a home.

textAttributes.tooltipText: “Real estate professionals” includes the real estate agents and brokers, mortgage lenders and loan officers, property managers, and other professionals you interact with through Zillow. Zillow Premier Agent is an advertising program that helps connect customers to local real estate professionals. Zillow Premier Agent partners are paid advertisers and are not affiliated with Zillow, Inc. brokerage or any of its affiliates.
